text: Arthurella is a genus of flies in the family Muscidae.Patitucci, L.D., Mariluis, J.C., & Aballay, F.H. (2011). "A new species of South American genus Arthurella Albuquerque (Diptera: Muscidae), with a key to species and new records." Zootaxa 2810: 56-62. ==Selected species== * Arthurella choelensis Patitucci & Mariluis, 2011 * Arthurella nudiseta Albuquerque, 1954 ==References== Category:Muscidae genera
title: Arthurella
